newsitem.title: JAPAN: FOMC decision not affecting BOJ policy - officials.
newsitem.headline: FOMC decision not affecting BOJ policy - officials.

text.p: The U.S. Federal Open Market Committee's decision to leave interest rates unchanged at its meeting on Tuesday does not affect the Bank of Japan's (BOJ) monetary policy, BOJ officials said on Wednesday.
"It's really a matter of another country's monetary policy, and thus the BOJ's policy will not be affected," one BOJ official said.
The Bank of Japan has been pursuing a policy of ensuring economic recovery, officials said.
